A.title: Format Version
A.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.

C.title: Block Light filter
C.description: The amount of light this block will filter out. Higher value means more light will be filtered out (0 - 15).

D.title: Block Light Emission
D.description: The amount of light this block will emit in a range [0.0, 1.0].

E.title: Break On Push
E.description: When pushed by a piston the block breaks.

F.title: Breathability
F.description: Property describing the breathability of the block, and whether it's treated as a solid block or a block of air.

G.title: Destroy Time
G.description: Sets the destroy time property for the block. Greater numbers result in greater mining times. Time is measured in seconds with base equipment.

H.title: Display Name
H.description: Specifies the language file key that maps to what text will be displayed when you hover over the block.

I.title: Entity Collision
I.description: Can only be set to false or an object, it disables the collision of the block with entities.

origin.title: Origin
origin.description: Minimal position Bounds of the collision box.

size.title: Size
size.description: Size of each side of the box of the component.

J.title: Explosion Resistance
J.description: Sets the explosion resistance for this block.

BA.title: Flammable
BA.description: Describes the flammable properties for this block.

burn_odds.description: How likely the block will be destroyed by flames when on fire. Value must be greater than or equal to 0.
burn_odds.title: Burn Odds

flame_odds.description: How likely the block will catch flame when next to a fire. Value must be greater than or equal to 0.
flame_odds.title: Flame Odds

BB.title: Friction
BB.description: Property describing the friction for this block. Friction effects an entities movements when it walks on the block.

BC.title: Geometry
BC.description: The geometry description identifier to use, this identifier must match an existing geometry identifier in any of the currently loaded resource packs.

BD.title: Immovable
BD.description: An Immovable block cannot be pushed by pistons.

BE.title: Loot
BE.description: The path to the loot table, relative to the behavior pack. Path string is limited to 256 characters.

BF.title: Map Color
BF.description: A color represented as a hex value. This will be the color rendered to a map.

BG.title: Material Instances
BG.description: Maps face or material_instance names in a geometry file to an actual material instance. Material instance can either be a full material instance or a name to another already defined instance

BH.title: Only Piston Push
BH.description: Blocks with those components won't stick to stickyPistons.

BI.title: Part Visibility
BI.description: Maps bone names in a geometry file to a condition that turns their rendering on/off. The condition should be a Molang query that uses block properties to determine true/falseSupported queries include 'has_block_property', 'block_property', and other queries that can evaluate without knowledge of the block's in-game positional or player affected data.

condition.description: The condition of event to be executed on the block.
condition.title: Condition

event.description: The event executed on the block.
event.title: Event

min_fall_distance.description: The minimum distance in blocks that an actor needs to fall to trigger this event.
min_fall_distance.title: Minimum Fall Distance

target.description: The target of event executed on the block.
target.title: Target

CG.title: Pick Collision
CG.description: Can only be set to false, it disables the collision of the block with entities.

origin.title: Origin
origin.description: Minimal position Bounds of the collision box.

size.title: Size
size.description: Size of each side of the box of the component.

CH.title: Placement Filter
CH.description: Sets rules for under what conditions the block can be placed/survive.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: List of conditions where the block can be placed/survive.

allowed_faces.title: Allowed Faces
allowed_faces.description: List of any of the following strings: up, down, north, south, east, west, side, all.

block_filter.title: Block Filter
block_filter.description: List of blocks (can use tags to specify them) that this block can be placed against in the allowed_faces direction.

CI.title: Prevents Jumping
CI.description: This component makes it so actors can't jump when walking on this block.

CJ.title: Random Ticking
CJ.description: Describes the component that will trigger an even at a regular interval between two values.

on_tick.title: On Tick
on_tick.description: Describes the component that will trigger an even at a regular interval between two values.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: The condition of event to be executed on the block. Molang

event.title: Event
event.description: The type of event executed on the block.

target.title: Target
target.description: The target of event executed on the block.

range.description: The Range between which the component will trigger his event.
range.title: Range

DA.title: Rotation
DA.description: This is the block's rotation around the center of the cube in degrees. The rotation order is x-y-z.

DB.title: Ticking
DB.description: Describes the component that will trigger an even at a regular interval between two values.

range.title: Range
range.description: The Range between which the component will trigger his event.

on_tick.title: On Tick
on_tick.description: Describes the component that will trigger an even at a regular interval between two values.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: The condition of event to be executed on the block. Molang

event.title: Event
event.description: The type of event executed on the block.

target.title: Target
target.description: The target of event executed on the block.

DC.title: Unit Cube
DC.description: Specifies that a unit cube is to be used with tessellation.

DD.title: Unwalkable
DD.description: Sets the block as unwalkable. Mobs would not attempt to path over top of it when the value is set to true.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: The condition of event to be executed on the block.

event.title: Event
event.description: The event executed on the block.

target.title: Target
target.description: The target of event executed on the block.

menu_category.title: Menu Category
menu_category.description: The category this block will be placed in in the menu.

group.title: Group
group.description: A translation string of an existing group in minecraft to group this item under

identifier.description: The identifier for this block. The name must include a namespace and must not use the Minecraft namespace unless overriding a Vanilla block.
identifier.title: Identifier

is_experimental.description: If this block is experimental, it will only be registered if the world is marked as experimantal.
is_experimental.title: Is Experimental

register_to_creative_menu.description: Whether or not to register this block to the creative inventory menu.
register_to_creative_menu.title: Register To Creative Menu
